mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, openapi_spec, enabled, created_at, updated_at FROM plugin WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, name, description, openapi_spec, enabled, created_at, updated_at FROM plugin WHERE enabled = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plugin (user_id, name, description, openapi_spec, enabled, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{openapiSpec}, #{enabled}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE plugin SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, openapi_spec = #{openapiSpec}, enabled = #{enabled}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
